Interface RestService

public interface RestService

Known derived/implementing types:
SendEmailService, SendEmailTemplateService

Interface for custom rest services.


Change History

- 08/30/2024   Initial version.

Group:
    Interfaces

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public abstract RestServiceResponse
execute(RestRequest request, String service)
Method to execute the service

Methods

public abstract RestServiceResponse execute(
  RestRequest request,
  String service
)

Known derived/implementing methods:
SendEmailService.execute(RestRequest,String), SendEmailTemplateService.execute(RestRequest,String)

Method to execute the service

Parameters:
    request – RestRequest: The received request context.
    service – String: The service to execute.

Returns:
    RestServiceResponse: The response of the service.
